His two hands clearly passed over the pure vase.
He didn't know he was already in the godlike city.
It's just as well that he has the adamantine eye.
It's a half-moon journey further than Mt. Sumeru.

source_sentence: 建中靖國續燈錄卷第二十八
translation: Jianzhong Jingguo xuedenglu, vol. 28
